title: [Ruins, Parapet Approach]
description: The edge of the platform is reinforced with tall, rectangular blocks, each carved with a different rune.  A set of stone steps leads north to a raised, circular terrace.  Set off to the side is an abandoned pile of wood.

The edge of the platform is reinforced with tall rectangular blocks, each carved with a different rune.  A set of stone steps leads north to a raised platform.  Set off to the side is an abandoned pile of wood.
